nodes.text: Tavuu was a major city on Radhii, a planet located in the galaxy. Tavuu was built on high plateau over a jungle named Zoess. In the eastern part of the city, where the Imperial base and the prison Segenka was located, criminals and criminal elements were active. The western part, on the contrary, lived peacefully - its inhabitants concluded an unspoken agreement not to contradict the new authorities, since they had nowhere to retreat.
